name: @nimbella/storage-provider
description: The types that must be implemented by every Nimbella storage provider
author: Nimbella Corporation

scripts.prepack: rimraf lib && tsc -b && npm run minify
scripts.minify: test $NO_MINIFY || for i in `find lib -type f -name \*.js`; do npx minify $i > minified; mv minified $i; done
